name: stream_video_saver_extension
description: A Chrome extension that captures HLS stream m3u8 files and their associated segment files, then packages them into a ZIP file for download.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esbuild && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r jszip.min.js dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp icon*.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p dist/templates && cp src/templates/*.template dist/templates/ 2>/dev/null || true
